item.Description: Total number of visits performed by the scheduler this night.
Sky position angle of upcomming targets.
Total visit time for each upcomming target.
Comma-separated string with the ids of the general proposals.
Comma-separated string with the ids of the sequence proposals.
Sun altitude that marks the beginning/end of the night.
Moon illumination that marks the beginning/end of dark nights
What type of startup should the scheduler do? COLD, WARM or HOT?
If WARM or HOT start, give the path to the startup database.
Barometric air pressure of the observatory.
Telescope maximum speed of the altitude axis.
Camera rotator position for changing the filter.
Should rotator aways align north with camera y-axis?
After a filter change, should rotator move back to original position?
How long does it take to replace a filter in the camera?
How long does it take to change the filter?
Comma separated string with the name of the mounted filters
Which filters can be removed from the camera?
Comma-separated prerequisites for dome to start moving in altitude. Will wait for these actions before moving.
Comma-separated prerequisites for dome to start moving in azimuth. Will wait for these actions before moving.
Comma-separated prerequisites for dome to settle in azimuth.
Comma-separated prerequisites for telescope to start moving in altitude. Will wait for these actions before moving.
Comma-separated prerequisites for telescope to start moving in azimuth. Will wait for these actions before moving.
Comma-separated prerequisites for telescope optics open loop to start adjusting. Will wait for these actions before moving.
Comma-separated prerequisites for telescope optics closed loop to start adjusting. Will wait for these actions before moving.
Comma-separated prerequisites for telescope to settle. Will wait for these actions before moving.
Comma-separated prerequisites for camera rotator to start moving. Will wait for these actions before moving.
Comma-separated prerequisites for filter change. Will wait for these actions before moving.
Comma-separated prerequisites for exposure to start. Will wait for these actions before moving.
Comma-separated prerequisites for exposure readout to start. Will wait for these actions before moving.
Not sure what this is about.
Comma-separated prerequisites for optics alignment. Will wait for these actions before moving.
Comma-separated prerequisites for positioning guider. Will wait for these actions before moving.
Comma-separated prerequisites guider to start operating. Will wait for these actions before moving.
Multiplication factor to account the time it takes to align the optics given the size of a slew.
How much can altitude change without the need to perform closed loop correction?
How long does it take to perform a closed loop?
Sun altitude for when night start/end for this proposal.
What is the acceptable sidereal time variation?
Avoid observing a tile with a bright solar planet in it?
Current observing night from start of the survey.
If closed, how long will the observatory be closed?
Timestamp when the measurement was taken.
Scale to convert int to float (multiplicative factor)
Zero point for the map (additive factor).
Time when the measurement was taken.
Time when the measurement was taken
